products.title: Phoenix White (Moisture Resistant)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure phoenix white (moisture resistant) bathroom vertical blinds from soeasy blinds. Order quality bathroom vertical blinds online today at low prices with fast uk delivery
products.productdescription:
Min width: 250mm max width: 5000mm
 	min drop: 500mm max drop: 4000mm
 	fabric composition: 25% fibreglass / 75% pvc
 	louvre width: 89mm &amp; 127mm
 	guarantee: 12 months
 	fittings: included
 	controls: cord control to open/close and beaded chain to tilt louvres, or wand control to open/close and twist wand to tilt louvres.
 	Stack: a choice of left, right or split.
 	Louvres: louvres are supplied with top hangers and are available with bottom weights with stabilising chain or chainless bottom weights.

Min width: 200mm max width: 3000mm (1740mm fabric turned)

 	note: supplied with a white round visible bottom bar.

 	tube: robust aluminium tube
